abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Regional
            Development and Social Protection Grant Project is to reduce
            the economic and social disparities among regions. The
            closing date for the Moldova project will be extended from
            September 30, 2011 until September 30, 2012. This is the
            second extension follows the signing of an amendment to
            extend the closing date of the administrative agreement with
            the World Bank by one year, to December 31, 2012. This
            extension will allow for the completion of components three
            and four, namely the road maintenance and waste water
            treatment activities.
